posts.title: The science of deduction
posts.content: Deduction someone is not as easy as you might think. But there are ways to determine what someone is thinking. Do you wanna know how this works? Let's find out

posts.title: The Lifecycle of Stars
posts.content:
In the first stage, we've got stellar nebulae. They are cloud of dusts and in it, the stellar nurseries are the regions where they give birth the stars. Because of the extreme temperature there, hydrogen fusion starts.
     As the fusion stabilized and gain a helium core, its the start of a new main sequence star. Our sun is an example of main sequence star. Hydrogen are still fusing into helium in this stage.
     In the next stage, the helium are also starting to fuse into carbon. And now these main sequence stars are evolved. Depending on the mass, they either become red giant or red supergiant. In the stage, the star is redder, bigger as its expanded but the mass is smaller and the heat is a bit reduced.
     ...to be continue...
